message: Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'ANDROID_VERSION' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'APP_PACKAGE' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'APP_VERSION' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'FILES_PATH' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'PHONE_MODEL' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'TraceVersion' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'URL' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
